Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
Transaction
public class Transaction extends Object
This class stores data about each transaction. Transactions can be deposits, withdrawals, or transfers. For transfer transactions, this class must be instantiated with both origin and target account numbers
Author:
dbabichenko

    Transaction(String transactionType, double amount, String originAccountNumber)
    This constructor creates a transaction for a deposit or a withdrawal.

  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(String transactionType, double amount, String originAccountNumber)
      This constructor creates a transaction for a deposit or a withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      transactionType - Transaction type - deposit or withdrawal
      amount - Transaction amount
      originAccountNumber - Account number associated with the transaction

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(String transactionType, double amount, String originAccountNumber, String destinationAccountNumber)
      This constructor creates a transaction for a deposit or a withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      transactionType - Transaction type - transfer
      amount - Transaction amount
      originAccountNumber - Account number associated with the origin account
      destinationAccountNumber - Account number associated with the destination account
